price: 9. Ceux qui croient et accomplissent les bonnes œuvres, leur Seigneur les conduira, en raison de leur foi, dans la bonne direction (yahdîhim). Des rivières couleront sous leurs pieds dans les Jardins des délices.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti yahdīhim rabbuhum biīmānihim tajrī min taḥtihimu al-anhāru fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
